archimate:DataObject.name: Proof
archimate:DataObject.documentation: Cryptographic verification of a Claim or a Credential. A digital signature is a simple form of Proof. A cryptographic hash is also a form of Proof. Zero Knowledge Proofs enable selective disclosure of the information in a Credential. See Appendix G.
